p: In the remaining studies, HIV‐positive MSM‐specific HCV clusters were exclusively observed, indicating the absence of a shared network with PWID. In Hong Kong, a large monophyletic cluster of subtype 3a (n = 36) was identified in 2010 to 2016 [ 20]. In Hubei, a cluster of subtype 2a (n = 4) was also identified in 2007 to 2010 [ 17]. In the small study conducted among transgender women (n = 6) in Surabaya, subtype 3k was deduced to be a unique variant for sexually acquired HCV in Indonesia [ 22].
